inclusion.criterion: Male or female subject aged 18 to 60
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: BMI ≥ 30kg / m² or MG ≥ 35% of total weight in men / 40% of total weight in women
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hypothalamic obesity, defined as obesity with hyperphagia, and cognitive or neuropsychological disorders
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Treatments not modified for at least 2 months (growth hormone, gonadotropic / thyrotropic / corticotropic substitution, Minirin, psychotropic drugs, etc.)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Affiliation to a social security scheme
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: feeding behavior (GLP1 analogues, Topiramate, psychotropic drugs, etc.)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Decompensation of a cardiorespiratory or psychiatric pathology in the 3 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject in a situation that, in the opinion of the investigator, could interfere with his / her optimal participation in the study (eg severe behavioral disorders) or constitute a particular risk for the patient (eg severe cardiorespiratory pathology).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Contraindication to the physical activity discovered during the first evaluation (electrocardiogram abnormalities, abnormal stress test, abnormal cardiac echocardiography or effort scintigraphy, etc.).
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Interruption of more than 15 days of the foreseeable monitoring protocol (leave etc ..).
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has agitation and altered mental status with hypoxia, which may indicate a severe cardiorespiratory pathology. Also, patient's treatments have been modified recently.
